001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model;
002
003import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
004import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.SingleSource;
006import java.util.Date;
007import java.util.LinkedList;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Set;
010
011/**
012 * Handles all stats about a game
013 */
014public class Game {
015
016  private final List<Guess> guesses;
017  private final Team correctAnswer;
018  private final Date start;
019
020  /**
021   * Sets the secret team
022   * @param correctAnswer Team
023   */
024  public Game(Team correctAnswer) {
025    this.correctAnswer = correctAnswer;
026    guesses = new LinkedList<>();
027    start = new Date();
028  }
029
030  /**
031   * gets the list of guesses submitted.
032   * @return List<Guesses>
033   */
034  public List<Guess> getGuesses() {
035    return guesses;
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Gets the start time of a game
040   * @return Date
041   */
042  public Date getStart() {
043    return start;
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Gets the correct answer for a game.
048   * @return Team
049   */
050  public Team getCorrectAnswer() {
051    return correctAnswer;
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Checks if the game has been solved.
056   * @return boolean
057   */
058  public boolean isSolved() {
059    return guesses.stream().anyMatch((Guess::isCorrect));
060
061  }
062
063}
